steps.title: Discovery & Problem Framing
steps.description: We work closely with you to understand your business challenges, define success metrics, and identify AI opportunities.

steps.title: Data Strategy & Preparation
steps.description: We assess your data landscape, clean and prepare data, and create robust data pipelines for model training.

steps.title: Model Development & Training
steps.description: Our data scientists develop and train custom models, iterating until performance meets your business objectives.

steps.title: Deployment & Integration
steps.description: We deploy models into production with robust APIs and integrate seamlessly with your existing systems.

steps.title: Monitoring & Optimization
steps.description: Continuous monitoring ensures model performance, with regular updates and optimization for sustained business value.
